sections.heading: statement; penalty.Any person making any false statement as to any material thing in a request for payment or reimbursement shall be deemed guilty of perjury and shall be punished accordingly

sections.text:
81-1170.05.False statement; penalty.

Any person making any false statement as to any material thing in a request for payment or reimbursement shall be deemed guilty of perjury and shall be punished accordingly.

SourceLaws 1895, c. 65, § 5, p. 236;R.S.1913, § 6690;C.S.1922, § 6227;C.S.1929, § 77-2616;R.S.1943, § 77-2416;Laws 1953, c. 285, § 2, p. 923;R.S.1943, (1986), § 77-2416;Laws 1988, LB 864, § 18.
